alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 12:54PM EST until December 20 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... New Hampshire... Saco River At Conway affecting Cumberland, Carroll and Oxford Counties. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Rockingham and Strafford Counties. Warner River At Davisville affecting Merrimack County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Merrimack River AT Goffs Falls affecting Rockingham, Hillsborough and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Merrimack River at Goffs Falls. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Low lying flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
